CLIENT_SECRET=""avinode_xZq1Ak139E1++nY5Uek2!S3lh3+@V+56uyi!@Uy6Jc!Wy#z1""

TIMESTAMP=$\(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ\)

echo ""=== Attempting OAuth 2.0 Client Credentials Flow ===""
echo ""Using --data-urlencode to properly encode special characters""
echo """"

  -H ""Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded"" \\
  -H ""X-Avinode-ApiToken: $API_TOKEN"" \\

  -H ""X-Avinode-Product: Jetvision/1.0.0"" \\

  --data-urlencode ""client_id=$CLIENT_ID"" \\
  --data-urlencode ""client_secret=$CLIENT_SECRET"" \\
  --data-urlencode ""expiresInMinutes=120""
')

Bash(git -C /Volumes/SeagatePortableDrive/Projects/v0-jetvision-assistant commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(chat\): improve scroll behavior to prevent unwanted jumps during RFQ loading

- Add smart scroll detection that only auto-scrolls when user is near bottom
- Skip scrolling during Trip ID loading to prevent layout shift jumps
- Track previous message count to only scroll on actual new messages
- Use block: ''nearest'' option to minimize scroll impact on page
- Use requestAnimationFrame to ensure DOM updates before scrolling

This prevents the chat interface from jumping when RFQFlightsList
component loads or when state updates occur without new messages.
